message.content:
The task is to extract the value of "Cash and Cash Equivalents at the beginning of the period" from the given cash flow statement.

Looking at the provided problem data:

| Account              | Amount     | Date       |
|----------------------|------------|------------|
| Cash and Cash Equivalents |            | 2024-01-29 |
| Beginning Balance    | 8000000.00 | 2024-01-29 |
| Ending Balance      | 340378.06  | 2024-01-29 |
| Net Increase        | -7659621.94| 2024-01-29 |

The line item specifically labeled "Beginning Balance" under "Cash and Cash Equivalents" shows the value 8000000.00.

Therefore, the answer for the beginning balance of cash and cash equivalents is 8000000.00.

```json
{"solution": {"value": "8000000.00"}}
```
